title: Andrew Yang Interview and more
itunes:title: Andrew Yang Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had presidential candidate Andrew Yang stop by where he spoke about Universal basic Income, benefiting from tech, his run for President and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Hockey Broadcaster Don Cherry for his comments about 'You People' and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had presidential candidate Andrew Yang stop by where he spoke about Universal basic Income, benefiting from tech, his run for President and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Hockey Broadcaster Don Cherry for his comments about 'You People' and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
